snippet.title: Leg Geometric Mean Theorem
snippet.description:
How to use the Leg Geometric Mean Theorem. We discuss how when you drop a perpendicular in a right triangle how 3 similar triangles are formed and where the theorem comes from as well as how to use it through some examples.

0:32 Geometric Mean Leg Theorem
1:17 Example 1 solving for the missing leg length
1:53 Example 2 solving for the other missing leg length
2:29 Example 3 solving for the part of the hypotenuse adjacent to the leg
3:16 Brief discussion of how you can use similar triangles to prove the geometric mean theorem and understand why it works.

* Organized List of My Video Lessons to Help You Raise Your Scores & Pass Your Class. Videos Arranged by Math Subject as well as by Chapter/Topic. (Bookmark the Link Below)
